Please no text on images to explain your: Obrazy nie mogą zawierać tekstu wyjaśniającego historię
Shuffle images in order to make a nonsen: Pomieszaj obrazy, aby kolejność nie miała logicznego sensu

Terminate your identity and withdraw the: Zlikwiduj swoją tożsamość i wypłać z portfela Stake. Twój status tożsamości zostanie zresetowany do Not validated.

Use built-in node to have automatic upda: Użyj wbudowany Node, aby mieć automatyczne aktualizacje

See your validation rewards in the block: Zobacz swoje nagrody za walidację w explorerze blockchain

You must provide valid URL including pro: Musisz podać prawidłowy adres URL zawierający wersję protokołu
Please wait. The network is reaching con: Jeszcze chwila, sieć określa konsensus zakończonej walidacji
Your node is outdated because of the har: Twój Node jest nieaktualny z powodu hard forka, zaktualizuj
Otherwise, please update your remote nod: W przeciwnym razie ręcznie zaktualizuj zdalny Node.
Can not start validation session because: Nie można rozpocząć walidacji, ponieważ nie aktywowałeś zaproszenia
Nie można rozpocząć walidacji, ponieważ nie wysłałeś flipów.

Since invitation codes are supposed to b: Z założenia kody zaproszeń mają być rozdawane prywatnie, dlatego śmiało niszcz zaproszenia, które są udostępniane publicznie. Zapobiegnie to gromadzeniu kodów zaproszeń przez boty. Po kliknięciu Zniszcz, zaproszenie zostanie aktywowany przez losowm adres

Solve more than 12 flips to become Verif: Rozwiąż więcej niż 12 flipów, aby zdobyć status Verified
Select meaningful story: left or right: Wybierz sensowną historię: lewa czy prawa
Spoil invitations that are shared public: Niszcz zaproszenia, które są udostępniane publicznie. To zachęci ludzi do prywatnego rozdawania zaproszeń i zapobiegnie gromadzeniu przez boty kodów zaproszeń
When you click 'Spoil' the invitation co: Po kliknięciu 'Zniszcz' kod zaproszenia zostanie aktywowany przez losowy adres i zmarnowany.
Submit the form to start mining. Your no: Wyślij formularz, aby rozpocząć wydobycie. Node musi pozostać włączony dopóki nie dezaktywujesz statusu wydobycia. W przeciwnym wypadku, jeśli Node będzie wyłączony dłużej niż godzinę, mogą być naliczane kary.
Your answers for the validation session: Twoje odpowiedzi z walidacji zostały poprawnie wysłane!
Now solve bunch of flips to check its qu: Teraz rozwiąż kilka flipów, aby zweryfikować ich jakość. Flip zostaje zakwalifikowany, jeśli większość, czyli więcej niż 2/3 uczestników, da tą samą odpowiedź.
Your answers are not yet submitted: Twoje odpowiedzi nie zostały jeszcze przesłane
Please qualify the keywords relevance an: Określ powiązanie słów kluczowych i prześlij odpowiedzi.
The flips with irrelevant keywords will: Flipy z niepowiązanymi słowami kluczowymi będą ukarane.
Your answers for the qualification sessi: Twoje odpowiedzi z sesji kwalifikacyjnej zostały wysłane!
Poczekaj na wyniki walidacji. Minie trochę czasu, zanim sieć osiągnie konsensus zakończonej walidacji. Po lewej stronie zobaczysz czas do zakończenia walidacji.
Sorry your answers won’t be submitted si: Niestety twoje odpowiedzi nie zostaną wysłane, gdyż walidacji dobiegła końca.

reviewMissingFlips: You need to answer <2>all flips</2> otherwise you may fail the validation.

After publishing or launching, you will: After publishing or launching, you will not be able to edit the voting parameters.
Title: Title
You must provide at least 2 options: You must provide at least 2 options
You must either choose start date or sta: You must either choose start date or start now
Refunded when voting in majority and los: Refunded when voting in majority and lost when voting in minority
Period when secret votes are getting pub: Period when secret votes are getting published and results are counted
The minimum share of the votes which an: The minimum share of the votes which an option requires to achieve before it becomes the voting outcome
% of the Oracle rewards you receive: % of the Oracle rewards you receive

See all transactions updates in Explorer: See all transactions updates in Explorer
Deposit will be refunded if your vote ma: Deposit will be refunded if your vote matches the majority
To get a reward for the voting you must: To get a reward for the voting you must be online at least once during the period of vote counting
Rewards will be paid to Oracles: Rewards will be paid to Oracles
50% of the stake will be refunded to you: 50% of the stake will be refunded to your address after termination
Prolong the voting in order to select a: Prolong the voting in order to select a new voting committee
Declare the winner and pay rewards to or: Declare the winner and pay rewards to oracles.
Finish voting and refund oracles with th: Finish voting and refund oracles with their lock funds.
Terminate the contract to clean-up its s: Terminate the contract to clean-up its state and release the stake
Waiting for rewards distribution or term: Waiting for rewards distribution or termination
The share of Oracle committee sufficient: The share of Oracle committee sufficient to determine the voting outcome
Terminate the contract to clean-up its s: Terminate the contract to clean-up its state and refund 50% of the stake to the owner
Recommended in some scenarios, e.g. swit: Recommended in some scenarios, e.g. switching accounts.
This vote is not available to you. Only: This vote is not available to you. Only validated identities randomly selected to the committee can vote.
There are no votings for you: There are no votings for you
There are no votings for you because you: There are no votings for you because your status is not validated.
Including a share of minority voters' de: Including a share of minority voters' deposit
The number of randomly selected oracles: The number of randomly selected oracles allowed to vote
Total funds locked during the voting and: Total funds locked during the voting and paid to oracles and owner afterwards
% of the Total funds you receive: % of the Total funds you receive

Join the official Idena public Telegram group and follow instructions in the

Keep your node synchronized in 60-30 min: Keep your node synchronized in 60-30 minutes before the validation starts.

You can lose your stake, all your mining: You can lose your stake, all your mining and validation rewards if you delegate your mining status.
You can disable delegation at the next e: You can disable delegation at the next epoch only.

Submit the form to start mining. Your node has to be online unless you deactivate your status. Otherwise penalties might be charged after being offline more than 1 hour.
You can deactivate your online status at any time.

Submit the form to deactivate your minin: Submit the form to deactivate your mining status. You can activate it again afterwards.

Add this event to your personal calendar so that you don't miss the

Hard fork will be activated at any date: Hard fork will be activated at any date after {{startActivationDate}}

You can not vote for the hard fork updat:
You can not vote for the hard fork update since your mining status is deactivated.

The mining penalties might be charged if:
The mining penalties might be charged if the fork is activated by the

Please be aware that both mining and val: Please be aware that both mining and validation rewards will go to the pool’s owner address if you delegate your mining status. Your address will get only the part of rewards that goes to your stake. Your identity could be terminated by the pool owner and you can lose your stake.
Disabling delegation could be done at th: Disabling delegation could be done at the next epoch only.
Submit the form to start mining. Your no: Submit the form to start mining. Your node has to be online unless you deactivate your status. Otherwise penalties might be charged after being offline more than 1 hour.
You can not vote for the hard fork updat:
You can not vote for the hard fork update since your mining status is deactivated.

Please read the rules carefully. You can: Please read the rules carefully. You can lose all your validation rewards if any of your flips is reported.
Import is not available for the external: Import is not available for the external node
The flip is to be reported: The flip is to be reported
You'll get rewards for reported flips if: You'll get rewards for reported flips if these flip are also reported by other participants (more than 50% of qualification committee).
Oracles who vote against the majority ar: Oracles who vote against the majority are penalized. Voting will be started in a future date.
Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards: Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards will be paid to everyone regardless of the outcome of the vote.
51% consensus is required to make a desi: 51% consensus is required to make a desision
Internal node is not available, try agai: Internal node is not available, try again in a few seconds
Please report the flip in the following: Please report the flip in the following cases:
You can not find a keyword in the story: You can not find a keyword in the story
You'll get rewards for reported flips if: You'll get rewards for reported flips if this flip are also reported by other participants.
You'll get a reward if the flip is also: You'll get a reward if the flip is also reported by other participants (more than 50% of the qualification committee is required).
One of the keywords is not clearly visib: One of the keywords is not clearly visible in the story
There are numbers or letters indicating: There are numbers or letters indicating the order
There are labels indicating the right or: There are labels indicating the right order
Some of the Idena users can not not read: Some of the Idena users can not not read the text in your local language
There is text that is necessary to read: There is text that is necessary to read to solve the flip
Please re-sync the node if you want to h: Please re-sync the node if you want to have an up-to-date transaction history for the new address. It will take some time to re-sync.
You need to create at least 3 flips per:
You need to create at least 3 flips per epoch to participate
                    in the next validation ceremony. Follow step-by-step
                    instructions.
You'll get rewarded for every successful: You'll get rewarded for every successfully qualified flip.

Read carefully "What is a bad flip" rules to avoid
